name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lenny Tab - Learn New Languages Passively

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn new language passively every time you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lenny Tab helps you passively learn new language every time you open a new tab in your browser. No cramming or boring classes. Just install the extension and go about your day as usual. With our extension, you will be able to memorize up to 100 new words per month, without being distracted from your daily activities.

Main functions:
★ New word with translation every time you open a new tab
★ Audio pronunciation for every word
★ Examples of using the word with audio
★ More than 30 sets of words for any level of language knowledge
★ Exercises for memorizing words
★ Google/Bing/DuckDuckGo/Yandex search options

Your privacy is our priority
Lenny Tab doesn't track what you search for, what you buy, or anything like that. We are sure that you are a very interesting person, but this is not for us.

To further our mission of teaching users new words, we display a small ad block on the new tab screen after 7 days of usage.
